title: Can Soil Health Improve a Farmer/Rancher's Life Too?

tasks.task: Transitioned to no-till farming, cover cropping, and rotational grazing.
subtasks: Convert from traditional tilling methods to no-till farming.
Plant cover crops to support soil health.
Implement rotational grazing to manage cattle pastures.

tasks.task: Improved water infiltration and increased holding capacity.
subtasks: Enhance soil structure through reduced tillage and cover crops.
Monitor pastures to ensure adequate rest periods between grazing.
Evaluate water retention in soil over time.
Adjust rotational grazing plans as needed to maintain optimal conditions.
